name: Into Darkness (7 Day Games)
description:
Into Darkness is a short, horror themed endless faller. There is no ending, just see how long you can survive.

[Dev Note]
I had more plans for this, but ran out of time after spending way too long on bugs. I wanted to expand on the horror theme, by making additional noises, monsters, and even have the obstacles look at the player and talk. I got 2 different bugs that took me way too long to fix and thus I could not deliver on any of this. I stuck to my theme though and it is time to release it. There will not be any future additions outside of fixing any major bugs.
